channel.title: Google I/O on Andy Dyer
channel.description: Recent content in Google I/O on Andy Dyer

item.title: Google I/O 2014: An Android Developer's Perspective
item.description: This yearâ€™s Google I/O developer conference once again gave developers plenty to be excited about. As expected, we heard about the next release of the Android operating system, Android Wear smart watches, and updated development tools. Rumored products & services such as Android TV, Android Auto, and Google Fit were also announced. Perhaps the most exciting and far-reaching announcement was the new Material Design language, which replaces the now dated looking Holo with a consistent look for all platforms.
